title: Can only get raven Leblanc if you purchase a bunch of other skins?
body: I only want raven Leblanc but you can only get it if you pay a lot of RP for other skins I don't want.. Riot please make raven purchasable without all the other skins.

replies.body: Came out last years harrowing. It'll be out again for this years harrowing, if you want to purchase it separately.

Not necessarily true.

For example, Katarina's Kitty Cat skin was released in '10 harrowing and wasn't re-released until 2013 harrowing.

Ravenborn LeBlanc is a legacy skin, which was available during the 2014 Harrowing. 

The only way to obtain this skin at the moment is through Mystery Gifting.

It was, in either 2013 or 2014 harrowing, can't remember which though I'm pretty certain it was '13.

It's now a legacy skin, as are all holiday skins.
It came out last year, so 2014...
